mdRecord.dcterms:title: Little essays of love and virtue / by Havelock Ellis
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ellis, Havelock, 1859-1939
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Children and parents.--The meaning of purity.--The objects of marriage.--Husbands and wives.--The love-rights of women.--The play-function of sex.--The individual and the race.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: PS3511 .A86 Z45 .E55 L5 1922: Original tan boards with black backstrip. From the library of Phil Stone, William Faulkner's mentor, with Stone's signature. From the William Faulkner collection, of William Boozer: MSS 15425.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Stone, Philip Avery, 1893-1967--Library--Personal copy.
Boozer, William, 1927---Library--Personal copy.
